Text:
Confirming torrent is legit and works great. Thanks for the upload, Ahmed.

This is such a useful program for anyone into editing videos.

For those who don't know how a crack works, like me until 2 sec ago, once you install the program you take the file in the "crack" folder and copy/move it to the folder containing the main program.  You'll have the right folder when it asks to replace a file, do it.

Otherwise looks like it works
